name: Aghamix
overview: Aghamix, beautiful sovereign of the planet Aghamix was removed by the mad scientists of the constellation of the Cat. Your mission is to deliver the delightful captive who, to help you, will leave one of her clothes at each step and will be very grateful to you if you succeed in tearing them away from these evil hands. Aghamix is a graphics game with superb music and elaborate animation. Let yourself be seduced, board your ship and go on an adventure or multiple dangers await you.
